recipesJson.name: Holy Matrimony
recipesJson.author: Fleming
recipesJson.description: Cake batter and vanilla cupcake make the cake part of the recipe. Vanilla ice Cream by liquid barn not only cream things up a bit but also is the cream filling in the top layer, the hazelnut also adds a bit of dimension.  Flavor west sweetener at .75% if you like sweet cake enjoy!!!! Made for Flavor Pro contest Jennife Jarvis The Queen of Vape.
